name: Cash in Hand
description: Physical cash kept at society office for immediate small expenses and petty transactions

name: Petty Cash
description: Small fixed amount maintained for daily minor expenses like courier, small purchases, etc.

name: Bank Account - Current Account (Society Operations)
description: Main operating account for day-to-day income and expense transactions

name: Bank Account - Savings Account (Reserve Fund)
description: Savings account to park idle funds and earn interest

name: Bank Account - Sinking Fund
description: Dedicated account mandated by law for major repairs and asset replacement (typically 0.25% to 0.5% of construction cost annually)

name: Bank Account - Corpus Fund
description: One-time non-refundable contribution from members for society's permanent capital, cannot be used for routine expenses

name: Bank Account - Major Repair Fund
description: Special fund accumulated for planned major renovation, waterproofing, structural repairs

name: Fixed Deposits - Short Term (less than 1 year)
description: Bank FDs maturing within one year, used to earn better interest than savings account while maintaining liquidity

name: Other Receivables
description: Other amounts receivable from various sources

name: Interest on Maintenance Arrears Receivable
description: Penal interest charged on delayed maintenance payments as per society bye-laws (typically 12-18% per annum)

name: Maintenance Dues Receivable
description: Outstanding maintenance dues from members (includes maintenance charges, water charges, and all bill components). This account must always match the member dues register.

name: Electricity Charges Receivable
description: Outstanding electricity charges for common areas to be recovered from members

name: Parking Charges Receivable
description: Unpaid parking fees from members who have allotted parking spaces

name: Non-Occupancy Charges Receivable
description: Reduced maintenance charges due from members whose flats are locked/unoccupied

name: Transfer Fees Receivable
description: NOC (No Objection Certificate) charges due when members sell/transfer their flats

name: Club/Amenity Fees Receivable
description: Outstanding fees for gym, swimming pool, clubhouse usage

name: Advance to Members
description: Refundable amounts given to members (rare), like excess payment to be adjusted

name: Interest Accrued on Fixed Deposits
description: Interest earned but not yet credited to bank account

name: GST Input Tax Credit
description: GST paid on purchases/services that can be claimed back and adjusted against GST payable

name: TDS Receivable
description: Tax deducted at source by bank on interest income, can be claimed while filing IT returns

name: Advance to Contractors
description: Part payment made to contractors before work completion as per agreement

name: Advance to Suppliers
description: Advance paid to vendors for bulk purchase of materials or supplies

name: Advance to Staff
description: Salary advance or loan given to employees, to be recovered from future salaries

name: Prepaid Insurance
description: Insurance premium paid in advance for coverage period not yet expired

name: Prepaid License Fees
description: Annual license/registration fees paid in advance for future period

name: Security Deposits Paid
description: Refundable deposits given to electricity board, water authority, or vendors

name: Stationery Stock
description: Office supplies like paper, pens, files, registers kept in stock

name: Maintenance Supplies
description: Commonly used items like bulbs, tubes, switches, minor electrical items kept for quick replacement

name: Cleaning Material Stock
description: Cleaning liquids, phenyl, brooms, mops, garbage bags kept in stock

name: Hardware and Tools
description: Small tools, plumbing fittings, nuts, bolts, nails kept for emergency repairs

name: Society Building (Common Areas)
description: Value of common areas like lobbies, staircases, corridors, terrace owned by society

name: Compound Wall and Gates
description: Boundary walls, main entrance gates, side gates of society premises

name: Internal Roads and Pathways
description: Roads, walkways, pavements within society compound

name: Drainage System
description: Underground drainage pipes, manholes, storm water drains

name: Water Tank and Storage
description: Overhead and underground water storage tanks with their structure

name: Overhead Water Tank
description: Elevated water tank for gravity-fed water supply to all floors

name: Underground Water Sump
description: Underground storage tank collecting municipal water or borewell water

name: Sewage Treatment Plant (STP)
description: Plant for treating sewage water for reuse in gardening, flushing

name: Rainwater Harvesting System
description: System to collect and store rainwater for groundwater recharge or usage

name: Parking Area/Structure
description: Open or covered parking structures, parking platforms, multilevel parking

name: Lifts/Elevators
description: Passenger and goods lifts including machinery, cabin, and control systems

name: DG Set/Generator
description: Diesel generator for backup power during electricity failures

name: Transformer and Electrical Installations
description: Society's own transformer, HT panels, electrical infrastructure

name: Clubhouse
description: Building or area for community gatherings, functions, meetings

name: Gymnasium Equipment
description: Treadmills, cycles, weights, and other fitness equipment

name: Swimming Pool
description: Pool structure, filtration system, pumps (civil + mechanical)

name: Children's Play Area Equipment
description: Swings, slides, see-saws, play structures for kids

name: Community Hall
description: Indoor hall for functions, celebrations, meetings with furniture

name: Landscaping and Garden
description: Plants, trees, lawns, garden development cost

name: Sports Facilities
description: Badminton court, tennis court, basketball court with equipment and fencing

name: Office Furniture and Fixtures
description: Desks, chairs, cupboards, shelves in society office

name: Computers and IT Equipment
description: Desktop/laptop computers for office administration

name: Printers and Scanners
description: Printing and scanning equipment for notices, bills, documents

name: CCTV System
description: Surveillance cameras, DVR, monitors, cabling for security

name: Intercom System
description: Internal communication system connecting flats to security gate

name: Fire Fighting Equipment
description: Fire extinguishers, hose reels, hydrants, sprinkler systems

name: Water Purifier/RO Plant
description: RO system for drinking water in common areas/clubhouse

name: Office Air Conditioner
description: AC units installed in society office

name: Accumulated Depreciation - Building
description: Total depreciation charged on building since purchase/construction

name: Accumulated Depreciation - Lifts
description: Total depreciation on lifts over their useful life

name: Accumulated Depreciation - DG Set
description: Depreciation accumulated on generator

name: Accumulated Depreciation - Equipment
description: Depreciation on gym equipment, CCTV, office equipment, etc.

name: Accumulated Depreciation - Furniture
description: Depreciation on all furniture and fixtures

name: Fixed Deposits - Long Term
description: Bank FDs with maturity period exceeding one year

name: Mutual Funds
description: Investment in debt or equity mutual funds for better returns on surplus funds

name: Government Securities/Bonds
description: Investment in government bonds, treasury bills for safe returns

name: Post Office Deposits
description: Fixed deposits or recurring deposits in post office schemes

name: Security Deposits with Electricity Board
description: Refundable deposit paid to electricity department for connection

name: Security Deposits with Water Authority
description: Refundable deposit with municipal water department

name: Security Deposits with Vendors
description: Refundable deposits given to AMC vendors to ensure service quality

name: Capital Work in Progress
description: Cost of assets under construction/installation, not yet ready for use

name: Sundry Creditors/Accounts Payable
description: Amount owed to suppliers, vendors for goods/services received on credit

name: Electricity Bill Payable
description: Unpaid electricity bills for common areas

name: Water Bill Payable
description: Outstanding water charges due to municipal corporation

name: Property Tax Payable
description: Municipal property tax on society premises yet to be paid

name: Outstanding Contractor Bills
description: Bills received from contractors for work done but payment pending

name: Staff Salaries Payable
description: Staff salaries for the month worked but not yet paid

name: Security Wages Payable
description: Security guards' wages accrued but payment pending

name: Housekeeping Charges Payable
description: Housekeeping service charges due to vendor

name: Lift Maintenance Charges Payable
description: AMC charges for lift maintenance company yet to be paid

name: Legal and Professional Fees Payable
description: Audit fees, legal fees, CA fees accrued but unpaid

name: Insurance Premium Payable
description: Insurance premium due but not yet paid

name: TDS Payable (on Contractor Payments)
description: Tax deducted from contractor bills to be deposited with government (1% or 2% depending on amount)

name: TDS Payable (on Salaries)
description: Income tax deducted from staff salaries to be paid to IT department

name: TDS Payable (on Professional Fees)
description: Tax deducted from CA, lawyer, consultant fees (10% TDS) to be deposited

name: GST Payable
description: GST collected from members minus input credit, payable to government

name: Provident Fund (PF) Payable
description: Employee + employer PF contribution deducted but not yet deposited with EPFO

name: ESI Payable
description: Employee State Insurance contribution deducted, pending deposit with ESIC

name: Professional Tax Payable
description: Professional tax deducted from staff salaries, to be paid to state government

name: Income Tax Payable
description: Society's income tax liability (if society income exceeds exemption limit)

name: Security Deposits from Members
description: Refundable deposits collected from members (rare in most societies)

name: Advance Maintenance Received
description: Maintenance charges received in advance for future months

name: Advance Parking Charges Received
description: Parking fees collected in advance for future periods

name: Advance from Members (for specific projects)
description: Special contributions from members for particular projects

name: Refundable Deposits from Members
description: Any other refundable amounts collected from members

name: Provision for Doubtful Debts
description: Estimated amount for maintenance dues that may not be recovered from defaulting members

name: Provision for Expenses
description: Estimated liability for expenses incurred but bills not yet received

name: Provision for Major Repairs
description: Amount set aside (provisioned) for anticipated major repairs

name: Loans from Banks
description: Long-term loans taken from banks for major capital projects like lift replacement, building repair

name: Loans from Members
description: Interest-bearing or interest-free loans taken from members for society projects

name: Unsecured Loans
description: Loans without any collateral, typically from directors/members

name: Corpus Fund
description: Permanent capital fund created from one-time contribution by all members, cannot be utilized for routine expenses

name: Sinking Fund (Replacement Reserve)
description: Mandatory fund (0.25%-0.5% of construction cost annually) for major repairs, reconstruction, or asset replacement

name: Major Repair Fund
description: Special fund built up for planned major repairs like waterproofing, structural repairs, painting

name: Emergency Fund
description: Reserve fund for unforeseen emergencies, disasters, urgent major repairs

name: Building Fund
description: Fund specifically for building-related major works

name: Lift Replacement Fund
description: Dedicated fund for complete lift replacement after useful life (typically 15-20 years)

name: Generator Replacement Fund
description: Fund for replacing DG set when it becomes obsolete

name: Swimming Pool Maintenance Fund
description: Dedicated fund for pool renovation, equipment replacement

name: Renovation Fund
description: General fund for future renovation and modernization of society

name: Festival Celebration Fund
description: Fund for celebrating festivals, annual day, society functions

name: Welfare Fund
description: Fund for member welfare activities, social causes

name: Opening Balance - General Fund
description: Surplus/deficit carried forward from previous years

name: Surplus/(Deficit) for the Current Year
description: Net profit or loss for current financial year

name: Accumulated Surplus
description: Total accumulated surplus from all previous years

name: Monthly Maintenance Charges
description: Regular monthly charges collected from all members for society upkeep, calculated per sq.ft. or flat size

name: Water Charges
description: Monthly water charges collected from members based on usage or flat size

name: Electricity Common Area Charges
description: Recovery of common area electricity expenses from members

name: Lift Maintenance Contribution
description: Separate charges collected for lift maintenance expenses

name: Generator Maintenance Contribution
description: Charges for DG set maintenance and diesel cost

name: Interest on Delayed Maintenance Payments
description: Penal interest charged from members paying maintenance late (typically 12-18% p.a. as per bye-laws)

name: Non-Occupancy Charges
description: Reduced maintenance charges (typically 50-70%) collected from members whose flats are locked/unoccupied

name: Parking Charges - Open
description: Monthly/annual charges for open parking slots

name: Parking Charges - Covered
description: Higher charges for covered/protected parking spaces

name: Extra Parking Charges
description: Premium charges when member takes additional parking beyond their entitlement

name: Sinking Fund Contribution
description: Mandatory annual contribution from all members to sinking fund (typically 0.25-0.5% of construction cost)

name: Corpus Fund Contribution
description: One-time non-refundable contribution from members for permanent capital

name: Major Repair Fund Contribution
description: Special contribution collected for planned major repairs

name: Club/Amenity Usage Charges
description: Charges for using clubhouse facilities, party hall

name: Swimming Pool Membership Fees
description: Annual or monthly membership fees for pool usage

name: Gymnasium Membership Fees
description: Subscription charges for gym facility users

name: Community Hall Rental Income
description: Charges for booking community hall for private functions

name: Function Hall Booking Charges
description: Fees for reserving function hall for celebrations

name: Guest Room Rental Income
description: Charges when members book society guest room for visitors

name: Transfer Fees (NOC Charges)
description: Fees charged when member sells flat and society issues NOC (typically ₹5,000-₹25,000)

name: Duplicate Bill/NOC Charges
description: Charges for issuing duplicate maintenance bills, NOC copies

name: Late Payment Fees/Penalty
description: Flat penalty charged for late payment in addition to interest

name: Reconnection Charges
description: Fees for reconnecting water/amenity after disconnection due to non-payment

name: Name Change Fees
description: Charges for changing member name in society records

name: Tenant Registration Charges
description: Fees for registering tenants in society records

name: Vehicle Sticker Charges
description: Charges for issuing vehicle entry stickers/passes

name: Rent from Mobile Tower
description: Monthly rent from telecom companies for mobile tower on terrace

name: Rent from ATM Space
description: Rent from banks for ATM space on society premises

name: Rent from Advertisement Hoardings
description: Income from advertising companies for hoardings on society walls

name: Rent from Shop/Commercial Space
description: Rent if society has commercial shops/spaces

name: Roof Space Rental
description: Rent for solar panels, telecom equipment, water tanks placed on roof by third parties

name: Interest on Fixed Deposits
description: Interest earned on bank FDs

name: Interest on Bank Savings Account
description: Interest credited by bank on savings account balance

name: Dividend Income
description: Dividend received from mutual fund or equity investments

name: Interest on Loans to Members
description: Interest charged when society gives interest-bearing loans to members

name: Scrap Sale Income
description: Income from selling old iron, steel, metal scrap

name: Sale of Old Newspapers
description: Income from selling accumulated newspapers to scrap dealer

name: Sale of Recyclable Materials
description: Income from selling plastic, bottles, cardboard to recyclers

name: Visitor Pass Charges
description: Charges for issuing visitor entry passes

name: CCTV Access Charges
description: Fees charged for providing CCTV footage to members

name: Insurance Claim Received
description: Amount received from insurance companies for claims

name: Donation Received
description: Voluntary donations from members or external parties

name: Miscellaneous Income
description: Any other income not classified elsewhere

name: Salaries - Office Staff
description: Monthly salary of office assistants, clerks working in society office

name: Salaries - Manager/Secretary
description: Salary of society manager handling day-to-day operations

name: Salaries - Accountant
description: Salary of accountant maintaining society books of accounts

name: Wages - Security Guards
description: Wages paid to security guards protecting society premises

name: Wages - Housekeeping Staff
description: Wages to cleaning staff maintaining cleanliness in common areas

name: Wages - Gardeners
description: Wages to gardeners maintaining lawns, plants, landscaping

name: Wages - Plumbers
description: Wages to full-time plumber for routine repairs and emergency fixing

name: Wages - Electricians
description: Wages to electrician for electrical maintenance and repairs

name: Wages - Lift Operators
description: Wages to lift operators (if lifts are not fully automatic)

name: Staff Bonus and Incentives
description: Annual bonus, Diwali bonus, performance incentives to staff

name: Staff Provident Fund (Employer's Contribution)
description: Society's 12% contribution to employee PF

name: ESI (Employer's Contribution)
description: Society's contribution to Employee State Insurance (3.25% of wages for employees earning below ₹21,000)

name: Staff Welfare Expenses
description: Medical reimbursement, festival gifts, welfare activities for staff

name: Staff Uniform
description: Cost of uniforms provided to security guards, housekeeping staff

name: Staff Medical Expenses
description: Medical insurance premium or medical expenses reimbursement for staff

name: Gratuity Payment
description: Gratuity paid to employees on retirement/resignation (15 days salary for each year of service after 5 years)

name: Office Rent
description: Rent paid if society office is in rented space (rare)

name: Printing and Stationery
description: Cost of printing society notices, letterheads, bills, registers, pens, files

name: Postage and Courier
description: Charges for sending legal notices, documents by post/courier

name: Telephone and Internet Charges
description: Landline, broadband charges for society office

name: Mobile Expenses
description: Mobile bills for manager, security supervisor

name: Computer Maintenance
description: Annual maintenance, repairs of office computers

name: Software Subscription
description: Cost of society management software like ApnaComplex, MyGate, NoBrokerHood

name: Office Equipment Maintenance
description: Repairs of printers, scanners, photocopiers

name: Photocopier Expenses
description: Toner, drums, service charges for photocopier

name: Books and Periodicals
description: Law books, accounting books, magazines for office reference

name: Legal and Professional Fees
description: General legal consultation charges for society matters

name: Auditor's Remuneration
description: Fees paid to chartered accountant for annual audit

name: Consultant Fees
description: Fees to management, technical, or financial consultants

name: Advocate Fees
description: Lawyer's fees for legal disputes, court cases, drafting agreements

name: CA/Tax Consultant Fees
description: Fees for tax filing, TDS returns, GST returns preparation

name: Property Valuation Charges
description: Fees for property valuation by approved valuer

name: Architect Fees
description: Fees paid to architect for building plans, renovation designs

name: Engineer Fees
description: Structural engineer fees for structural audit, building assessment

name: Bank Charges and Commission
description: Bank charges for cheque books, demand drafts, online transactions

name: Insurance Premium - Society
description: Insurance for society property, buildings, assets against fire, earthquake

name: Insurance Premium - Employees
description: Group medical insurance or personal accident insurance for staff

name: License and Registration Fees
description: Annual license fees, registrar fees

name: Society Registration Renewal
description: Fees for renewing society registration with registrar

name: AGM/Meeting Expenses
description: Cost of conducting Annual General Meeting - refreshments, printing agenda

name: Notice Board Expenses
description: Cost of notice boards, display boards, updating information

name: Festival Celebration Expenses
description: Expenses for Diwali, Holi, Republic Day, Independence Day celebrations

name: Member Welfare Activities
description: Expenses for health camps, blood donation camps, awareness programs

name: Annual Day Celebration
description: Cost of organizing society annual day event

name: Lift AMC Charges
description: Annual Maintenance Contract charges paid to lift company for regular servicing

name: Lift Repair and Maintenance
description: Expenses for lift repairs beyond AMC coverage

name: Lift Spare Parts
description: Cost of replacement parts like ropes, pulleys, cables, buttons

name: Lift Breakdown Charges
description: Emergency repair charges when lift breaks down

name: Lift Modernization Expenses
description: Cost of upgrading old lift systems, installing new technology

name: Generator AMC Charges
description: Annual maintenance contract for generator servicing

name: Generator Fuel (Diesel)
description: Diesel consumed for running generator during power cuts

name: Generator Oil and Lubricants
description: Engine oil, coolant, lubricants for generator maintenance

name: Generator Repair and Maintenance
description: Repair expenses beyond AMC

name: Generator Spare Parts
description: Cost of batteries, filters, spark plugs, alternator parts

name: Electrical Repair and Maintenance
description: General electrical repairs in common areas

name: Electrical Materials and Supplies
description: Bulbs, tubes, switches, wires, MCBs, fuses

name: Street Light Maintenance
description: Repair and replacement of street lights in society

name: Common Area Lighting
description: Maintaining lighting in lobbies, staircases, parking areas

name: Electrical Testing Charges
description: Periodic electrical safety testing, earthing testing

name: Transformer Maintenance
description: Maintenance of society's dedicated transformer

name: Electrical Contractor Charges
description: Charges paid to electrical contractors for major electrical work

name: Plumbing Repair and Maintenance
description: Fixing leaks, pipe repairs, tap replacements

name: Water Tank Cleaning Charges
description: Professional tank cleaning charges (mandatory twice yearly)

name: Sump Cleaning Charges
description: Underground sump cleaning and disinfection

name: Drainage Cleaning
description: Cleaning clogged drains, manholes, drainage lines

name: Sewage Line Maintenance
description: Repairing, unclogging sewage lines

name: STP Maintenance
description: Sewage Treatment Plant maintenance, chemical costs, repairs

name: Plumbing Materials
description: Pipes, elbows, taps, valves, plumbing fittings

name: Water Pump Repair
description: Repairing water pumps for overhead tank filling

name: Building Repair and Maintenance
description: General building repairs, crack filling, minor civil work

name: Painting - Common Areas
description: Painting lobbies, staircases, corridors, parking areas

name: Painting - External
description: External building painting, facade painting

name: Waterproofing Expenses
description: Terrace waterproofing, external wall waterproofing

name: Flooring Repair
description: Repairing broken tiles, marble, flooring in common areas

name: Wall Plastering
description: Plastering walls, repairing damaged plaster

name: Compound Wall Repair
description: Repairing boundary walls, plastering compound walls

name: Gate Maintenance
description: Repairing, painting main gates, installing automatic gates

name: Road and Pathway Repair
description: Repairing internal roads, pathways, paver blocks

name: Terrace Maintenance
description: Terrace waterproofing, tile fixing, sunshade repairs

name: Seepage and Leakage Repair
description: Fixing water seepage problems in walls, ceilings

name: Housekeeping Charges/AMC
description: Contract charges to housekeeping company for cleaning services

name: Cleaning Materials and Supplies
description: Phenyl, detergents, mops, brooms, garbage bags, disinfectants

name: Garbage Collection Charges
description: Charges to municipal corporation or private agency for garbage collection

name: Pest Control Charges
description: Periodic pest control, termite control, rodent control services

name: Drain Cleaning Charges
description: Professional drain cleaning services

name: Septic Tank Cleaning
description: Septic tank evacuation charges

name: Disinfection and Fumigation
description: Disinfection services, especially during epidemics

name: Gardening and Landscaping
description: Professional gardening services, landscape maintenance

name: Plants and Seeds
description: Purchasing new plants, seeds, saplings for garden

name: Fertilizers and Manure
description: Organic manure, fertilizers, soil nutrients for plants

name: Garden Tools and Equipment
description: Lawn mowers, hedge trimmers, garden tools

name: Tree Trimming Charges
description: Professional tree cutting, pruning services

name: Horticulture Services
description: Expert services for maintaining lawns, flower beds

name: Electricity Charges - Common Areas
description: Electricity bills for lobbies, staircases, corridors, parking lighting

name: Electricity Charges - Lift
description: Electricity consumed by lifts

name: Electricity Charges - Water Pump
description: Power consumed by water pumps filling overhead tanks

name: Electricity Charges - Street Lights
description: Electricity for street lights and compound lighting

name: Electricity Charges - Clubhouse
description: Electricity bills for clubhouse, gym, swimming pool

name: Electricity Charges - Office
description: Power consumption in society office

name: Electricity Connection Charges
description: New connection charges, meter installation charges, load enhancement charges

name: Water Charges - Corporation/Municipal
description: Water bills from municipal corporation

name: Water Tanker Charges
description: Cost of water tankers during water shortage

name: Borewell Maintenance
description: Borewell cleaning, pump maintenance, motor repairs

name: Water Testing Charges
description: Laboratory testing of water quality

name: Water Treatment Charges
description: Charges for water treatment, chlorination

name: Gas Connection Charges
description: PNG connection charges if applicable

name: Sewage Charges
description: Sewage disposal charges if municipal corporation charges separately

name: Security Service Charges/AMC
description: Contract charges to professional security agency

name: Security Guard Uniform
description: Uniforms for security guards

name: Security Equipment
description: Torches, whistles, batons, reflective jackets for guards

name: CCTV Maintenance and Repair
description: Servicing, repairing CCTV cameras and DVR

name: CCTV Recording System
description: Hard drives, DVR upgrades for footage storage

name: Access Control System Maintenance
description: Maintaining biometric, RFID access control systems

name: Boom Barrier Maintenance
description: Servicing automatic boom barriers at entry/exit

name: Intercom System Maintenance
description: Maintaining intercom between flats and gate

name: Walkie-Talkie Expenses
description: Walkie-talkie sets for security guard communication

name: Fire Safety Equipment Maintenance
description: Annual maintenance of fire extinguishers, hydrants, sprinklers

name: Fire Extinguisher Refilling
description: Refilling expired fire extinguishers

name: Fire Safety Audit Fees
description: Professional fire safety audit charges

name: First Aid Supplies
description: First aid kits, medicines for emergency use

name: Safety Signage
description: Fire exit signs, emergency signs, safety instruction boards

name: Clubhouse Maintenance
description: General upkeep of clubhouse building and facilities

name: Gymnasium Equipment Maintenance
description: AMC and repairs of gym equipment

name: Swimming Pool Maintenance
description: Pool cleaning, filtration system maintenance, chemical balance

name: Swimming Pool Chemicals
description: Chlorine, pH balancing chemicals, algaecides

name: Sports Equipment Maintenance
description: Maintaining badminton court, tennis court, basketball court

name: Community Hall Maintenance
description: Maintaining furniture, AC, electrical fittings in hall

name: AC Maintenance - Clubhouse/Hall
description: Servicing, repairs, gas filling of air conditioners

name: Recreation Activity Expenses
description: Organizing yoga classes, Zumba, fitness activities

name: Property Tax
description: Annual property tax payable to municipal corporation

name: Water Tax
description: Annual water tax if charged separately by municipality

name: Sewage Tax
description: Sewage charges if levied by local authority

name: Professional Tax
description: Professional tax on society (if applicable)

name: Registration and Filing Fees
description: Annual return filing fees with registrar of societies

name: ROC Filing Fees
description: Registrar of Companies fees (if society is registered as company)

name: Income Tax
description: Tax payable if society has taxable income exceeding exemption limit

name: Interest on Loans
description: Interest paid on term loans from banks

name: Bank Charges
description: Service charges, transaction charges, SMS charges

name: Bank Service Charges
description: Cheque return charges, online payment charges

name: Loan Processing Charges
description: One-time charges for loan processing

name: Cheque Book Charges
description: Charges for issuing new cheque books

name: Depreciation - Building and Infrastructure
description: Annual depreciation on building as per accounting policy

name: Depreciation - Lifts
description: Depreciation on lifts over useful life (typically 15 years)

name: Depreciation - Generator
description: Depreciation on DG set (typically 8-10 years)

name: Depreciation - Equipment
description: Depreciation on gym equipment, CCTV, office equipment

name: Depreciation - Furniture and Fixtures
description: Depreciation on all furniture

name: Depreciation - CCTV and Security Systems
description: Depreciation on security equipment

name: Income Tax Expense
description: Final tax expense for the year

name: TDS Deducted
description: TDS amounts shown separately for reconciliation with Form 26AS

name: Legal Expenses and Court Fees
description: Court fees, stamp paper, legal documentation charges

name: Dispute Resolution Expenses
description: Arbitration, mediation charges for resolving disputes

name: Notice Charges
description: Legal notice charges, advocate fees for sending notices

name: Advertisement and Publicity
description: Advertising society facilities, newspaper ads

name: Society Newsletter/Magazine
description: Cost of publishing monthly/quarterly society newsletter

name: Website Maintenance
description: Charges for maintaining society website

name: Mobile App Subscription
description: Subscription for society management mobile app

name: Conveyance and Travel
description: Local travel expenses for society work

name: Vehicle Maintenance
description: Maintenance if society owns vehicle (rare)

name: Fuel - Vehicle
description: Petrol/diesel for society vehicle

name: Repairs and Maintenance - General
description: General repairs not classified elsewhere

name: Donation and Contributions
description: Donations to charitable causes

name: CSR Activities
description: Corporate Social Responsibility activities

name: Bad Debts Written Off
description: Irrecoverable maintenance dues written off

name: Loss on Sale of Assets
description: Loss when old assets sold below book value

name: Preliminary Expenses Written Off
description: Initial society formation expenses amortized

name: Miscellaneous Expenses
description: Small expenses not fitting any other category

name: Transfer to Sinking Fund
description: Amount transferred from general fund to sinking fund as per annual requirement

name: Transfer from Sinking Fund
description: Amount withdrawn from sinking fund for approved major repairs

name: Transfer to Major Repair Fund
description: Amount set aside from surplus for major repair fund

name: Transfer from Major Repair Fund
description: Utilization of major repair fund for approved works

name: Outstanding Maintenance - Member wise ledger
description: Individual ledger for each flat showing outstanding dues

name: Advance Maintenance - Member wise ledger
description: Individual ledger showing advance payments by members
